item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 2)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 1)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 8)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Master Merchant (Level 8)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Author (Level 9)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 8)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Hunter (Level 5)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Hunter (Level 4)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Butcher (Level 6)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Banker (Level 6)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Architect (Level 5)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Gipsy (Level 5)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 3)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Cathedral Worker (Level 4)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Goldsmith (Level 5)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 3)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 2)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Master Collector (Level 9)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Architect (Level 1)
item.description: Added a submodule to a repository.
